verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>responded,<s%> <S%H559><s%>
<S%H551>"Truly<s%> <S%H3588>then<s%> you are the <S%H5971>people,<s%> And with you <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> will <S%H4191>die!<s%>
"But I have <S%H3824>intelligence<s%> as <S%H1571>well<s%> as you; I am not <S%H5307>inferior<s%> to you. And <S%H4310>who<s%> does not <S%H854>know<s%> <S%H3644>such<s%> things as <S%H428>these<s%>?

"I <S%H1961>am<s%> a <S%H7814>joke<s%> to my <S%H7453>friends.<s%> The one who <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H433>God,<s%> and He <S%H6030>answered<s%> him; The <S%H6662>just<s%> [and] <S%H8549>blameless<s%> [man] is a <S%H7814>joke.<s%>
"He who is at <S%H7600>ease<s%> <S%H6248>holds<s%> <S%H6365>calamity<s%> in <S%H937>contempt,<s%> As <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for those whose <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H4571>slip.<s%>

"The <S%H168>tents<s%> of the <S%H7703>destroyers<s%> <S%H7951>prosper,<s%> And those who <S%H7264>provoke<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> are <S%H987>secure,<s%> <S%H834>Whom<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> into their <S%H3027>power.<s%>
"But <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and let them <S%H3384>teach<s%> you; And the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and let them <S%H5046>tell<s%> you.
<S%H176>"Or<s%> <S%H7878>speak<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and let it <S%H3384>teach<s%> you; And let the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5608>declare<s%> to you.
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> does not <S%H3045>know<s%> That the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%>

In <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> is the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>thing,<s%> And the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H376>mankind<s%> <S%H1320><s%>?
"Does not the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H974>test<s%> <S%H4405>words,<s%> As the <S%H2441>palate<s%> <S%H2938>tastes<s%> its <S%H400>food<s%>?
<S%H2451>"Wisdom<s%> is with <S%H3453>aged<s%> <S%H3453>men,<s%> [With] <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%> is <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
"With Him are <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1369>might;<s%> To Him belong <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> He <S%H2040>tears<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> and it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H1129>rebuilt;<s%> He <S%H5462>imprisons<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> and there can be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6605>release.<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> He <S%H6113>restrains<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and they <S%H3001>dry<s%> up; And He <S%H7971>sends<s%> them out, and they <S%H2015>inundate<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
"With Him are <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8454>sound<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom,<s%> The <S%H7683>misled<s%> and the <S%H7686>misleader<s%> belong to Him.
"He makes <S%H3289>counselors<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7758>barefoot,<s%> And <S%H1984>makes<s%> <S%H1984>fools<s%> of <S%H8199>judges.<s%>
"He <S%H6605>loosens<s%> the <S%H4147>bond<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> And <S%H631>binds<s%> their <S%H4975>loins<s%> with a <S%H232>girdle.<s%>
"He makes <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7758>barefoot,<s%> And <S%H5557>overthrows<s%> the <S%H386>secure<s%> <S%H386>ones.<s%>
"He <S%H5493>deprives<s%> the <S%H539>trusted<s%> ones of <S%H8193>speech,<s%> And <S%H3947>takes<s%> away the <S%H2940>discernment<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>
"He <S%H8210>pours<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> on <S%H5081>nobles,<s%> And <S%H7503>loosens<s%> the <S%H4206>belt<s%> of the <S%H650>strong.<s%>
"He <S%H1540>reveals<s%> <S%H6013>mysteries<s%> from the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> And <S%H3318>brings<s%> the <S%H6757>deep<s%> <S%H6757>darkness<s%> into <S%H216>light.<s%>
"He <S%H7679>makes<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7679>great,<s%> then destroys them; He <S%H6>enlarges<s%> the <S%H7849>nations,<s%> then <S%H1471>leads<s%> them away.

"He <S%H5493>deprives<s%> of <S%H3820>intelligence<s%> the <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> of the earth's <S%H5971>people,<s%> And makes them <S%H8582>wander<s%> in a <S%H3808>pathless<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H8414>waste.<s%>
"They <S%H4959>grope<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> with <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> And He makes them <S%H8582>stagger<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H7910>man.<s%>
